system.description:
Starting at 3rd level, when you prepare your artificer spells you can prepare certain spells and create spell inventions for them in addition to your normal number of prepared spells. These spells count as artificer spells for you, even if they aren’t on the artificer spell list. 

 

3rd: @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.nlto7z4j14ips45w]{Shield}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.b3t1nu2d4iq635e4]{Winter's Bite}

5th: @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.r3slodfvyd6w0zsa]{Magic Weapon}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.vk6a5fupk5x4dz39]{Seed Bomb}

9th: @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.jnjcp9k4sgs8m62j]{Crushing Haymaker}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.oloy0v2fh20s8y8g]{Dimensional Rend}

13th: @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.vjhks74rnijf518b]{Flail From Beyond}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.odvq2q7j2ijuxfyi]{Rage of the Meek}

17th: @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.mfh48gs70231lqdd]{Celestial Armory}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.dhjvbi9qysj1lfw5]{Weapon of the Chosen}
